io.craigmiller160.school.repo

Interface GenericPaginatedJoinHolderDao<T extends JoinHolder>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - an entity that implements the JoinHolder interface.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GenericJoinHolderDaoBean<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateScJoinHolderDao

    public interface GenericPaginatedJoinHolderDao<T extends JoinHolder>
    A generic DAO interface containing additional methods for accessing JoinHolders and the persisted entities they join in a paginated way. It should be be used to expand the capabilities of an existing JoinHolder DAO implementation. It can be used with basic JDBC or with ORM frameworks.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    craig

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <U> java.util.List<T> getEntitiesByPageFor(java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType, int entityId, int startPageAfterRow, int pageRowCount)
      Get a "page" of JoinHolder entities from the database that joined with the entity whose type and unique ID are specified in the parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntitiesByPageFor

        <U> java.util.List<T> getEntitiesByPageFor(java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                                           int entityId,
                                           int startPageAfterRow,
                                           int pageRowCount)
        Get a "page" of JoinHolder entities from the database that joined with the entity whose type and unique ID are specified in the parameters. A page is essentially a sub-list of records from the database. The size of a page is defined by the fourth parameter (pageRowCount). The offset is determined by the third parameter (startPageAfterRow).
        Type Parameters:
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinedEntityType - the type of entity to retrieve a "page" of its joined entities for.
        entityId - the unique ID of the entity to retrieve a "page" of its joined entities for.
        startPageAfterRow - the row in the table to start retrieving records after (eg. if this argument is 10, this method will retrieve records starting with row 11).
        pageRowCount - the total number of rows for the page (the total number of records to be retrieved).
        Returns:
        a sub-list of entities from the table that is a "page" of data, based on the supplied parameters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if this operation fails in some way.
